title: Lucky Hit
description: Oakley Hutton, the hockey prodigy. The guy ready to grab the sports world by the balls and finally live his dream.Octavia Layton, the girl unable to move beyond her broken past, fearful of her childhood betrayal following her through her new adult life.Two polar opposites with only one thing in common. Their inability to stay away from each other.Two people pushing the other in ways they've never experienced, forcing them out of their comfort zones and making them forget how different they really are after all.
author: Hannah Cowan
